channel.description: Learn about authenticator enrollment policy API changes Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Understand authenticator enrollment policy API changes after the upgrade: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oie-upgrade-mfa-enroll-policy/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
